response.original_title: Dear My Father -The story of a legendary hair dresser-
response.overview: The daughter of legendary hairdresser Takechiyo Ayanokoji documents the life of the man behind the “charisma beautician” boom. Personal vignettes paint an intricate portrait of Ayanokoji, who never gave up on his career even when faced with the removal of his vocal cords.
response.title: Dear My Father -The story of a legendary hair dresser-
